summary.para: Contains information used by the IOCTL_DISK_CREATE_DISK control code to initialize GUID partition table (GPT) disks.

remarks.para: The CREATE_DISK_GPT structure is defined as part of the structure.
If a maximum partition count of less than 128 is specified, it will be reset to 128. This is in compliance with the EFI specification.

summary.para: The disk identifier (GUID) of the GPT disk to be initialized.
The maximum number of partitions allowed on the GPT disk to be initialized without repartitioning the disk.
